mapper.select: SELECT id, location_code AS locationCode, province, city, county, location_level AS locationLevel FROM location WHERE location_level = '1'
SELECT id, location_code AS locationCode, province, city, county, location_level AS locationLevel FROM location WHERE location_level = '2' AND province = #{parentProvince}
SELECT id, location_code AS locationCode, province, city, county, location_level AS locationLevel FROM location WHERE location_level = '3' AND city = #{parentCity}
